question: could be improved for
response: It felt a little long if you didn't have a lot of trouble. Long periods of waiting around. Maybe add a little task at the end of the import, so you get to use the table you just imported. It was great with repetitions, but maybe the repetitions of importing the data could have been spread out a little bit more, it got a little dull :)
